name: Gensou no Artemis: Actress School Mystery Adventure
storyline: The game takes place in Ikoma Aku Torres Actress School, where different girls go to grow their perfomance abilities. One night, when a performing is taking place, the owner of the school jump off a roof to the death. The police thinks that is just a suicide, but the motive is still a mystery, so the people on charge of the school decide to hire a private detective to investigate.
summary: A first person perspective adventure game in which the player takes the role of a detective that has to investigate a murder in an actress school.
